entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 5:24 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High plus 5.
